name: Adventuring-BETA
description:
Hey, this is my first game's page! It's called Adventuring! A game about shooting zombies in their face and killing a boss! there are technically an infinite number of levels (randomly generated) and the number of zombies increases each level!

Use the arrow keys to move (square by square) and press space to shoot!
Find the Supagun and kill the Boss!

Note that this is still a beta. If you find bugs report them in the commentaries.

The sprites might change until the final release.
